name: One Night at MX's 2
description:
Story: After Lucas win the PC port Pizza Restaurant, MX and his Friends is coming get revenge on Lucas for Winning the PC port Pizza Restaurant.

Will you survive and win $11110K 

Sonic PC port by John-Kun

Mario PC port by Taco Games

FNF Hypnos Lullaby by Banbuds

Fnaf by Scott Cawthon
